glosses: Form of -sa after the vowels E / İ / Ö / Ü.
Form of -sa after the vowels E / İ / Ö / Ü.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish ـسا (-sa), ـس (-se), evolved from the verb Proto-Turkic *sā- or *sā(j)- (“to count, to consider, to desire something, to count something among one's wishes”). Cognates with Azerbaijani -sa, -sə, Karakhanid ـسا, ـسه.
